history.text: Hi
Have you seen this movie?
Hey. I can't see anything about the movie. What movie is it?
Its Despicable Me
Do you like animated movies?
This movie has Gru who is the voice of Steve Carell
Oh haha nice. I have younger siblings and cousins so I've seen tons of Dreamworks, Pixar, and Disney movies. How did the critics feel about the movie?
It got a rating of 81 percent on Rotten tomatoes and 72 out of 100 on Metacritic
it's pretty good
That's not bad. I'm assuming it's kid friendly and is comedic?
I think everyone enjoys these kind of movies
There is no real age limit on this
I could only assume so myself. Do you know who does the voice for the big guy with the big nose?
That Gru, Steve Carell
Vector is Jason Segel and Russell Brand is Dr nefano
Ah gotcha. I'm terrible with names. I didn't even know Russell Brand was in it. That's cool. What's it about?
Two super villains trying to attain the same goal by using some wicked tactics against each other.
one of them is Gru
Can't go wrong with a little bit of violence. How does the movie end?
It has a good mix comedy, drama and emotions
It is not very clear here

I guess you will have to watch it t
o find out
It's gotta get right into my feelings. Does anyone die? I don't know if my ol' itty bitty heart could take it.
I don't think so, it ends well
Always gotta have the stereotyped happy ending to leave me with feelings of bliss and joy. I'm sure my younger siblings and cousins would love it.
You should watch it, after all it is an animated movie with great quality animation
You can watch it with friends or family
Oh nice. I was afraid it'd be the old school claymation. Perhaps I'll take your advice. Do you think my grandma would like it?
I'm sure, it is pretty heartwarming
I think all age groups enjoy it
That's good to know. What's the saddest part of the movie?
I cannot pin point exactly but it is touching
You won't be disappointed
It did pretty well in theaters
My grandma and I will probably cry together. Which voice actor did the best performance?
Steve Carell
Sweetness. I may have to look into him. Who was it directed by?
Pierre Coffin
The name sounds familiar. Is it a Disney, Pixar, or Dreamworks film? Maybe something else entirely?

It's Univers
al Pictures

The only one I didn't mention. Of course. It sounds like it'd be pretty good though. Even the critics didn't find it too shaby and you seem to have a positive opinion about it. Is there a love interest in the movie?
We can finish the conversation. Have a good day!

uid2response.feedback: I think I'll watch the movie because I was told that it was appropriate for all ages and the critics gave it some pretty good reviews. I also like the voice actors in the movie. The person that I was talking to was also actively responding and engaging in the conversation.
